blessings.description: Boost your team's most Idolized player by 25%.
blessings.title: Rate and Review, brought to you by The Multitude Podcast Collective

blessings.description: Dial Zero. Call in the Alternate for the least Idolized player on your team.
blessings.title: Collect Call

blessings.description: Steal the 14th Most Idolized Player in the League.
blessings.title: Lottery Pick

blessings.description: Never heard of them. Maximize and steal the least Idolized player in the league.
blessings.title: Who?

blessings.description: Arrange your lineup in order of their Idolatry.
blessings.title: Headliners

blessings.description: Hello? Who's there? Replace a player on your team with the Alternate of a random player from another team.
blessings.title: Party Line

blessings.description: Gotta Go Fast. Boost Your Team's Speed by 15%.
blessings.title: Spin Attack

blessings.description: Learn its secrets. Boost Your Team's Power by 10%.
blessings.title: Ooze

blessings.description: Keep your enemies closer. Improve your entire division by 2%.
blessings.title: Mutually Arising

blessings.description: It's not stealing if we all do it. Improve your division by +10% hitting, -5% pitching.
blessings.title: Sharing Signs

blessings.description: They won't notice. Improve your division by +10% pitching, -5% hitting.
blessings.title: Move the Mounds Closer

blessings.description: Mulligan. Your Team gets the Fourth-Strike next Season.
blessings.title: Single-Season Fourth Strike

blessings.description: Armor. Prevent a random player on your team from Being Reverbed.
blessings.title: Gravity Boots

blessings.description: Item. Random player on your team hits 50% better during Solar Eclipses.
blessings.title: Night Vision Goggles

blessings.description: Get Tiny. Item. Random player on your team gets smaller strike zone, increased Baserunning, decreased Power.
blessings.title: Shrink Ray

blessings.description: Armor. Protect a random Player on your team from Incinerations.
blessings.title: Fireproof Jacket

blessings.description: Is good offense. Swap your best hitting pitcher into your lineup.
blessings.title: The Best Defense

blessings.description: Is good defense. Swap your best pitching hitter into your rotation.
blessings.title: The Best Offense

blessings.description: The best hitter in your team's subleague (Good or Evil) joins your team.
blessings.title: Headhunter

blessings.description: The best player in your team's division joins your team.
blessings.title: Vulture

decrees.description: Feel the Heat. Makes a random player on each team Spicy.
decrees.title: Hot Sauce

decrees.description: When a team is in Party Time --  Mathematically eliminated from the Postseason -- they'll have a chance of receiving random stat boosts during their games.
decrees.title: Enhanced Party Time

decrees.description: Incinerate the least Idolized player on every team.
decrees.title: New Kids
